mapper.select: /* dashboardCorPerformance.getSalesRanking */ SELECT '마곡' AS NAME, 245 AS VALUE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '동성로' AS NAME, 300 AS VALUE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '이천' AS NAME, 202 AS VALUE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '가락' AS NAME, 200 AS VALUE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '동해천곡' AS NAME, 196 AS VALUE FROM DUAL

/* dashboardCorPerformance.getSalesRanking */ SELECT '경기' AS NAME, 768990684 AS VALUE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '서울' AS NAME, 522597110 AS VALUE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '대구' AS NAME, 499882285 AS VALUE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '부산' AS NAME, 398219586 AS VALUE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '강원' AS NAME, 325328868 AS VALUE FROM DUAL
